bibl.seg: FOURNET Jean-Luc, Between Literary Tradition and Cultural Change: The Poetic and Documentary Production of Dioscorus of Aphrodite.

Alasdair A. MacDONALD, Michael W. TWOMEY and Gerrit Jan REININK (Edd.), Learned Antiquity. Scholarship and Society in the Near East, the Greco-Roman World, and the Early Medieval West = Groningen Studies in Cultural Change. 5 (Leuven, 2003) pp. 101-114.
